sentences.sContent: At a summer job working as park naturalists that year, I flipped the canoe Air and I were paddling and we had to push it to shore.
sentences.sContent_eng: At a summer job working as park naturalists that year, I flipped the canoe Air and I were paddling and we had to push it to shore.
sentences.sCn: 那年我在公园里做暑期兼职，我把独木舟翻转个身，然后我们一起合力将它推到岸边，这样我们就可以划船了。

trans.tranOther: a long light boat that is pointed at both ends and which you move along using a  paddle
